title: Evelynn's E should be reverted back to magic damage
body:
The reason for this nerf was because of her oppressive burst with a DFG EQ combo after the season 4 vision changes. 

Since DFG is being removed she should be able to itemize penetration more easily again.

replies.body: Agreed. She could also use some of the old strengths that she used to have, but they were taken away BECAUSE of DFG. For example, her ulti cd was 120/90/60 and now it's 150/120/90. 150 cooldown ulti that does virtually nothing early game is one of the most stupid things about Eve right now.
While this would be nice in the short go, she needs an ult that actually fits an assassin/hunter.
Ok, she's not being played right now which is why I encourage this. But please rework her again if she becomes a problem ( that passive. )

Seriously, her passive is not op. you can detect her from an absurd range out, and silver level vision control shuts her down.  She's been nerfed so hard because people don't want to deal with actually learning to play their lanes correctly it's absurd. I cannot rember the last time an Eve "showed up out of nowhere!!!!" and ganked my ADC as a support. it's pretty simple really:

1. is eve visable on the map? if no, don't push out. if yes, push.
2. is eve level 6? I should have a pink ward available at all times
3. am I level 9? there is no excuse for me not to have a upgraded sweeper and ensure I have total vision control wherever my team is grouping.
To be honest no one is ever going to learn how to play against her. Having "perma-stealth" (relax I know she be countered with it) isn't something Riot wants to have anymore in my opinion.
Yeah i think in her rework they might have her stealth become more of a active that has a cd.

You need to place wards on eve's jungle if you want to see her ( same problem with Rek'sai tunnels, team snowball and Riot doesn't like that )

Pink wards cost 100g. that's 1/3rd of a kill and rewards eve for just passing by because she succeeds by default using this strategy.

When eve is strong, her early game ganks become oppressive as hell. Personally I wish she'd be allowed to lane again without limiting an entire team's early game for existing.. :\

I absolutely agree that Eve is a mess right now and deserves buffs. 

Since S4, though, I would argue that oppressive burst with DFG was not the cause of all her ridiculous nerfs. She's been nerfed into the ground because S4 vision changes made her too difficult to ward against in the jungle.

Eve spent something like two years as the worst champion in the game (season 1 & 2). She was originally slammed with the nerf hammer because her stealth ganks were too unpredictable, and forced people to simply play passively all the time in the laning phase.

I would argue that her current stealth does the same thing. Pink wards are expensive, and they are incredibly easy to kill. There is no practical, cost efficient way to ward against Eve at the moment, so people simply have to play passively during the laning phase to avoid being killed by her. 

I don't think Riot will buff her until they find a way to make her stealth less oppressive. Until people can effectively ward against her, she is going to be kept  weak.
They need to revert a ton of her nerfs. AP mid eve was broken because of DFG, and as a result, they completely trashed her kit. If you are removing DFG, give us our awesome mid huntress back

She may actually need a straight up rework imo.

Or at the very least, more accessible and reliable tools to deal with her for enemy teams.

Step 1) Give her a new Innate.  I'm fond of her old Malice and Spite passive.
Step 2) Give her 3 seconds of true stealth on her W active OR move her passive stealth to her Ult and make the detect range decrease with level.  Either of these changes would allow plays to ward against Eve in a reasonable fashion.
Step 3) Buff her kit a lot.  I would suggest buffing her sustained damage because heavy burst out of stealth is awful to play against.  It would also help to differentiate her from the more burst-focused Knifecat and Obamabug.

It's almost impossible to jungle with her early on, but if you make it to late game without dying to every camp in your jungle and you get BotRk she does some pretty insane damage.

Nah, make her Q purely physical and applies on-hit to first target hit, make her resourceless, make her w a dash, and we get stealthy {{champion:157}} minus windwall xD
she can also abuse {{item:3153}}

I'd be alright with the W change if she also maintains the speed boost.  So she would jump a short distance and then sprint for x seconds.

Also, if she became manaless, they'd need to do something about her passive.

I've been wanting her to slow/stun any enemy hit coming out of her passive (same as pre-rework).  The easy way to counter this would be to do any damage to her before she gets to you, since you can see her coming.  It won't be as crazy as she was before.

If her Q becomes physical, I'd like her E to be magic.  I like her hybrid style.  

The other main thing is to change her ult to something that fits her theme.  The current one makes no sense on her.
